info.name: Lead Generation Platform API (v1)
info.description:
Production-ready Postman collection for the Lead Generation Platform. Auth via JWT. Admin-only writes unless stated.
Errors: 400/401/403/404/422/500. Soft-deleted items hidden in lists.

request.description: Returns access token ({{jwt}}) and refresh token ({{refreshToken}}).

response.body:
[
    {
        "id": 1,

        "description": "Customer budget",

        "options": null,

        "displayOrder": 1,

]

item.name: Create Field (Admin)->  TEXT,  FILE, MULTIPLE_CHOICE,NUMBER,DATE,EMAIL, PHONE,TEXTAREA,RADIO

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Company Name",
  "description": "What company Product You Want",
  "type": "TEXT",
  "required": true,
  "options": null,
  "validationRules": "{ }",
  "subcategoryId": 1,
  "displayOrder": 1,
  "active": true
}

request.description: options must be a JSON array string.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Clean pro",
  "description": "Updated",
  "cssStyles": "/* new css */",
  "jsScripts": "/* new js */",
  "htmlTemplate": "<section>{{form}}</section>",
  "active": true
}

response.name: List Leads (Admin/Client)
response.body:
{
    "content": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "subcategoryId": 2,
            "dataJson": "{\"name\":\"John\",\"email\":\"john@example.com\",\"budget\":50000}",
            "status": "NEW",
            "notes": null,
            "source": "website",
            "ipAddress": "1.2.3.4",
            "userAgent": "PostmanRuntime/LeadForm"
        }
    ],
    "pageable": {
        "pageNumber": 0,
        "pageSize": 20,
        "sort": {
            "empty": true,
            "sorted": false,
            "unsorted": true
        },
        "offset": 0,
        "paged": true,
        "unpaged": false
    },
    "last": true,
    "totalElements": 1,
    "totalPages": 1,
    "size": 20,
    "number": 0,
    "sort": {
        "empty": true,
        "sorted": false,
        "unsorted": true
    },
    "first": true,
    "numberOfElements": 1,
    "empty": false
}
